TopicTitle: [Mun] How to get to the mun.

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone! Tutorial uploaded! Enjoy this brief (10 min) tutorial on how to get to the moon!

(i use hyperedit to get into orbit, would've took me past the 10 min limit just getting to LKO.)

Edited June 15, 2014 by kenbobo

By my estimate, it has been about 40 minutes since you posted. That's 8 times as long as 5 minutes!

I recommend in the future that you wait until the video is actually finished and available for viewing before making a thread about it, unless that thread is to gather ideas for the video.

I hope to see the video soon.
